arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen completes a 4-3 comeback win in stoppage time as Boniface sinks Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Victor Boniface’s added-time goal lifted Bayer Leverkusen to a 4-3 comeback win over Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga on Sunday as the German champion produced another of its trademark late breakthroughs ahead of facing Bayern Munich next week. It was the second time in four Bundesliga games this season that Leverkusen has won in added time.

arts.ttl: Boniface strikes late as Leverkusen edge Wolfsburg in seven-goal thriller
arts.sum: Bayer 04 Leverkusen twice come from behind to beat VfL Wolfsburg 4-3 in a Bundesliga classic, with Victor Boniface scoring a dramatic stoppage-time winner for the defending champions. Their pressure paid off in the 32nd minute when Jonathan Tah rose highest to head home from a corner, giving the hosts a deserved 2-1 lead.
After their midweek performance against Feyenoord, Bayer Leverkusen followed up with a win against Wolfsburg which saw them come from behind twice to win 4-3. A slow start from Leverkusen…

arts.ttl: A red card and seven goals: Leverkusen topple Wolfsburg as Boniface bags injury time winner
arts.sum: After a busy midweek of European action, Bayer Leverkusen resumed domestic action on Sunday as they welcomed VfL Wolfsburg. The reigning Bundesliga champions prevailed 4-3 after a thrilling battle with VictorBoniface the hero.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs. VfL Wolfsburg
arts.sum: The lineups for this afternoon's Bundesliga clash between Germany's two "company cubs" have been confirmed.

arts.ttl: Liverpool ready to go all out and pay a club-record fee for 38-G/A attacker
arts.sum: Liverpool are very interested in signing the German international midfielder Florian Wirtz. The 21-year-old attacking midfielder has made a name for himself with his performance in the Bundesliga, and he helped Bayer Leverkusen win the league last season. arts.ttl: Predicted Bayer Leverkusen XI vs Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen return to Bundesliga action against Wolfsburg today following a rampant 4-0 win over Feyenoord in the Champions League on Thursday evening. Coming into this game, Xabi Alonso has…

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: “We’re Bayern and we don’t change” — Harry Kane promises to bring the fight to Leverkusen next week
arts.sum: Next Saturday, it will be the German Rekordmeister hosting the defending champions. Next Saturday, we will find out when Bayern Munich plays host to Bayer Leverkusen in the most anticipated match of the Bundesliga Hinrunde .

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz: Liverpool target first €100m signing as interest in Leverkusen ace confirmed
arts.sum: Liverpool are interested in signing Bayer Leverkusen playmaker Florian Wirtz in a deal that would likely shatter the club’s transfer record. He has a contract now until 2027, so Leverkusen want a big fee for his services - €150m.
